name: Astral (itch) (Ryu15)
description:
Astral is a grinding RPG game where you enter in a astral world to enhance your spiritual stats and go deeper through the levels of many different stages.

The game as of now is currently in alpha version and in its first version, a hard game that mostly take hours to complete. it has 10 levels with the 10th level being the boss battle. the map is also randomized so even if it is "10 levels" in context, it does not mean that it will only take you 10 rooms to find the boss' room.

Balancing will take place in the next update so uploading Astral in its first ever version without any tests is necessary to know the overall flow of the game.

I'm planning to further expand the game to not only going through the levels of the stages but also many ways that will not make the player feel that there's only one method to progress in the game further. I'm open to critics, reviews, and suggestions. Thankyou :)
